code: @Override public SecurityModule createModule(SecurityConfiguration securityConfig) {     // First check if we have Hadoop in the ClassPath. If not, we simply don't do anything.     try {         Class.forName("org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration", false, HadoopModule.class.getClassLoader()).     } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {         LOG.info("Cannot create Hadoop Security Module because Hadoop cannot be found in the Classpath.").         return null.     }     try {         Configuration hadoopConfiguration = HadoopUtils.getHadoopConfiguration(securityConfig.getFlinkConfig()).         return new HadoopModule(securityConfig, hadoopConfiguration).     } catch (LinkageError e) {         LOG.error("Cannot create Hadoop Security Module.", e).         return null.     } }
